message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for a starting point. Don't forget the money loses value with each round!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering we're both taking a risk by not accepting your previous offer.  Let's keep this reasonable!
Bob, I appreciate the negotiation, but 60/40 is too far off. I'm willing to meet in the middle - 52/48.  Another round and we'll both lose even more to inflation!
